snippet: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency revoked the bank’s right to shield the pay of former executives after a scandal over fake accounts....
lead_paragraph: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency revoked the bank’s right to shield the pay of former executives after a scandal over fake accounts.

headline.main: Regulator Tightens Control Over Wells Fargo
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo Faces a Rise in Oversight
